programme.title: Seafood!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going under the sea! We have a new batch of our favorite seafood recipes to share with you, so hop aboard and get ready to set sail!

programme.title: Veggies Veggies Everywhere
programme.desc: Today, well be showing you how to use green veggies in every meal, including snacks! We hope youre ready, because Mom wants you to eat all the veggies on your plate!

programme.title: Comfort Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, its time to get cozy with some of our favorite Tastemade comfort food recipes. Get cozy and settle in for whats sure to be a mouth-watering journey!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because were heading to Latin America! Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, were going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, its all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. Well showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, its time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, weve got it. So, what are you waiting for? Its time to get cooking!

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today weve got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Lets get to the pizza!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Frankie And Flour
programme.desc: Flour has the super power to transform into an endless variety of meals. Frankie teaches us how to make three different meals using flour as the affordable vehicle. Save money and strap on an apron. Its time to get messy in the kitchen.

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: You say hotdishes, Frankie says casserole. Either way, these one-pot hotdishes are an affordable way to feed a group of people, or the family for dinner. Plus theyre great to freeze for future meals!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten celebrates Christmas with his twist on the traditional Feast of the Seven Fishes including ceviche, crudo, oysters and more! Dont Panic!

programme.title: Grandmas Pizza
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten cooks classic Grandma style pizza including homemade dough, sauce and more. Dont Panic!

programme.title: A Journey to Salad Town
programme.desc: Salads can be way more fun! Come to Salad Town, for Mustard-Shallot Vinaigrette; Probiotic Ranch with Cheddar Croutons; a no-measure salad when for when youre in a rush; and the crunchy, crispy, acidic, cheesy, Chopped Salad of your dreams.

programme.title: Rustic Comfort Pastas
programme.desc: Perfect Pantry Puttanesca is packed with more flavor than you could ever hope for; a Rustic Pork Ragu will make you wonder why anyone ever makes Bolognese: and a Vegetarian Mushroom Ragu will make you wonder why anyone ever eats meat.

programme.title: Seafood!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going under the sea! We have a new batch of our favorite seafood recipes to share with you, so hop aboard and get ready to set sail!

programme.title: Veggies Veggies Everywhere
programme.desc: Today, well be showing you how to use green veggies in every meal, including snacks! We hope youre ready, because Mom wants you to eat all the veggies on your plate!

programme.title: Comfort Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, its time to get cozy with some of our favorite Tastemade comfort food recipes. Get cozy and settle in for whats sure to be a mouth-watering journey!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because were heading to Latin America! Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, were going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, its all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. Well showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, its time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, weve got it. So, what are you waiting for? Its time to get cooking!

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today weve got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Lets get to the pizza!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Food Truck Boss

programme.title: Stories in Motion

programme.title: Negeri Yang Hilang Di Sarawak
programme.desc: Datu Dr.Haji Sanib bin Haji Said yang menghabiskan sepanjang hayatnya mengabdi sebagai ilmuwan dan cendekiawan. Biografi beliau menjadi intipati utama dalam mencari negeri Melayu yang hilang di Sarawak.

programme.title: Borneo Dive

programme.title: Homegrown

programme.desc: Sung Dong-il, Kim Hee-won and new maknae embark on a journey with their house on wheels again! This time they will be travelling in Japan together with their celebrity friends.

programme.desc: 3 Meals A Day returns on its 10th anniversary. Cha Seung-won and Yoo Hae-jin will experience a self-sufficient village life again and enjoy simple yet fulfilling meals with surprise guests.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Romantic Italy
programme.desc: Join veteran camper Ra Mi-ran as she leads a trio of rookie campers - Kwak Sun-young, Lee Joo-bin and Lee Se-young - on a romantic camping trip across Italys hidden gems.

programme.title: Country Life of Gen-Z

programme.title: Atom Boyz
programme.desc: Atom Boyz 2 is a Taiwanese group-based survival audition show where contestants will overturn the galaxy with music and unleash a brand new cosmic wave.

programme.title: Homeward Bound
programme.desc: Jung-has peaceful life changes when her son Jin-woo, who studies in Canada, and his girlfriend Jenny show up. They are forced to live together after a mishap with their lodging, and secrets surface.

programme.title: The Kings Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90s Korea.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Long Live the King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: The Wild
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: Return of the Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: The investigation following a sales manager brutally killing his entire family leads to a track of mystery and tragedy in an overwhelmed work team at Seoul.

programme.title: The Girl on a Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juris grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Polices Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: Secret: Untold Melody
programme.desc: Yu-jun, an injured pianist, meets Jung-a in a college practice room, and they develop feelings for each other. He searches for her after she vanishes one day and discovers her secret.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Girl on a Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Tazza: the Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-nis nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now hes planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: Usury Academy
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: Harbin
programme.desc: In 1908, Ahn Jung-geun and Korean independence fighters win against Japanese army. A year later, they head to Harbin as the Japanese statesman Uto Hirobumi is going for negotiation...

programme.title: Long Live the King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landladys doltish son.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E24
programme.desc: Regresa Roberto que quiere encontrarse con Camila para recordar viejos tiempos. Max entender que no fue una prostituta. Gregorio y Julia en un hotel sorprendidos por Ezequiel. Pruebas que comprueban que Marcos no se suicido y es Ezequiel el culpable.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E25
programme.desc: Max pide matrimonio a Camila, ella no acepta, reconoce que lo ama, pero al saber la verdad el se decepcionara y se alejara. Roberto amenaza con contar a Max lo que sabe y hablar con Camila para negociar su silencio. Rosa Blanco quiere venganza.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E43
programme.desc: Israel enfurecido, apunta con su arma a Misael, decido a sacarlo de su camino. Pastora se impone defendiendo al padre de sus hijos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E44
programme.desc: Gabriel irrumpe en la habitacion de Clara Ines dispuesto a hacerle el amor.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E43
programme.desc: La casa Corona comienza a vestirse de gala para la celebracion del matrimonio entre Lorena y Alberto. Gertrudis le recuerda a Lorena su pacto de silencio y la amenaza con su vida Alberto sostiene una conversacion de hombre a hombre con el pequeo Ignacio. El nio, inocente, pregunta que va a pasar con su pap Guille.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E40
programme.desc: Adriana se escapa de su habitacion y al ver el estado en que se encuentra Cesar estalla en llanto.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E41
programme.desc: Ya en la habitacion, Adriana se deshace en atenciones hacia el gordo. Carlos Ral, devastado, se retira.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E42
programme.desc: El medico le comunica a Carlos Ral que la severa lesion que padece Cesar en la cabeza podra causarle la muerte tarde o temprano.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E005
programme.desc: Victoria no asiste a la cita que le hiciera Rosendo. Nicols y Liliana se besan con pasion cuando se activa accidentalmente el celular del joven y la voz de Victoria interrumpe el momento. Adelaida sorprende a Hilario besando a la fuerza a Florencia. Rosendo trata de sobrepasarse con Victoria, pero ella logra huir. Adelaida anuncia a Victoria e Hilario que decidio mandar a su hija a vivir a la capital.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E006 - Episodio 6
programme.desc: Victoria viaja a la capital. Adelaida explica a Hilario que mando a Victoria a la ciudad para que Rosendo no se cobrara en ella lo que el est haciendo con Florencia. Victoria decide buscar la manera de que Pablo se entere que ella est en la ciudad. Antonieta termina su noviazgo con Jons. Fernanda anuncia a Nicols y Felipe que Victoria est en la ciudad.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E25
programme.desc: Max pide matrimonio a Camila, ella no acepta, reconoce que lo ama, pero al saber la verdad el se decepcionara y se alejara. Roberto amenaza con contar a Max lo que sabe y hablar con Camila para negociar su silencio. Rosa Blanco quiere venganza.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E26
programme.desc: Max piensa que Camila lo rechazo por Roberto. En confesion con el Padre Tiziano, le aconseja que le cuente toda la verdad a Max, pero ella teme que Roberto la denuncie por asesina. Julia y Gregorio vuelven a encontrarse.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E44
programme.desc: Gabriel irrumpe en la habitacion de Clara Ines dispuesto a hacerle el amor.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E45
programme.desc: Israel conversa con Ral sobre el incidente ocurrido con Lucely cuando aparece Clara Ines buscando ayuda para ir al hospicio a ver a Rafael.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E44
programme.desc: Alberto se impresiona al or que el nombre del padre de Ignacio es Guillermo. Lorena se controla y, con la mayor naturalidad, le dice que es una terrible coincidencia de nombres, nada ms. Magda le confiesa a Lorena que fue ella la que denuncio a Guillermo. Alberto listo para su boda, cuando recibe la inesperada visita de Nilda.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E45
programme.desc: Alberto se entera que la mujer es la mam del ex de Lorena, y quiere sacarle dinero. Alberto confronta a Lorena, pidiendole que le diga toda la verdad sobre Nilda.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E08 - End of the Line
Miracles of Nature - S01:E10 - Naturally Potent
programme.desc: Explore las montaas vrgenes de Laponia y siga hasta los inmaculados Alpes suizos. Como contraste, viajaremos a la provincia francesa de Champaa, cuna de los mejores vinos del mundo. Por ltimo, Gibraltar atrae con su larga historia y sus extraas y misteriosas cuevas.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E11 - Naturally Different
programme.desc: Las islas Shetland: hogar de 20.000 seres humanos, un millon de aves y el caballo ms pequeo del mundo. A continuacion, a una zona conocida por los lugareos como el Centro del Mundo, en la provincia sudoriental de Kazajstn. Desde all iremos a las Montaas Amarillas, en China Central, a menudo llamadas La Venecia de China.

programme.title: Harry And Meghan: A Very Modern Romance
programme.desc: Meghan Markle dan Putera Harry berkongsi minat yang serupa dan nampak seperti pasangan yang sempurna. Keduanya telah menghadapi masa sukar semasa membesar tetapi telah berjaya. Kini mereka sedang berjaya bersama. Istimewa sejam ini, yang menampilkan perbualan dengan penulis Andrew Morton, meneroka latar sosial yang menjadikan perkahwinan beraninya sesuai dengan Keluarga Diraja Britain hari ini.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E38 - HM The Queen A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: The most notable woman in modern times has to be our Late Queen, Elizabeth II. She ruled for 70 years, the longest reign in British history. Once a princess who wasnt supposed to be queen, Elizabeth II led the country to thrive after World War II and became a steady presence in our changing world. In a thousand years of British monarchy, Elizabeth II is likely one of the most outstanding monarchs ever.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E12 - Naturally Vibrant
programme.desc: El sur de Moravia, en la Repblica Checa, alberga una gran variedad de hermosas orqudeas. Desde all nos dirigimos al Caribe, a Cuba, con sus vistas de increble belleza contrastadas con brutales peleas de gallos. De Cuba viajamos a Fiyi, en el Oceano Pacfico, a menudo considerado un verdadero paraso en la Tierra.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E13 - Naturally Hewn
programme.desc: En este episodio viajamos del Sur al Norte de Tierra Santa, Israel, deteniendonos para admirar las vistas y empaparnos de la importancia bblica de los lugares historicos. Continuamos hacia los Altos del Goln, en el Norte, donde el conflicto reciente sigue siendo muy evidente, y concluimos nuestra peregrinacion en las orillas de Galilea.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E01 - Riggins Gold
programme.desc: Hoy en Fiebre del Oro, Tom y su hija Kia se encuentran en el caudaloso ro Salmon, buscando pepitas de oro bajo el agua. kwadventure

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E02 - Blue Bucket Oregon Trail
programme.desc: Hoy en Fiebre del Oro, Tom y su hija Kia, estn en el camino de Oregon, a la caza de la legendaria Blue Bucket Mine.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E13 - The Best of Season 1
programme.desc: The best adventures and highlights from Uncharted so far.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E41 - Fergie The Downfall Of A Modern Duchess
programme.desc: This is the story about Sarah Ferguson, once known as Her Royal Highness, Duchess of York. But now, shes not really involved with the royals. She was someone who seemingly had it all but lost it when her name was linked to a big scandal.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E06 - Bearing Down
programme.desc: As they were having dinner, Casey noticed a bear wandering on the hill. Both he and R.L. sprinted through the rain, trying to get closer. Meanwhile, Chris was getting fed up with staying in the tent.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E08 - Moose Fever
programme.desc: R.L.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E09 - Weary Travellers
programme.desc: R.L. and Casey travel far from their camp to reach the heart of moose country as the rut begins. Meanwhile, Chris looks into finding a new way out because of the rough weather.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E10 - Lifted
programme.desc: A medida que su aventura en Alaska llega a su fin, Kaid y R.L. reflexionan sobre lo que realmente cuenta en la vida y lo que han descubierto sobre vivir. Los lazos de toda la vida son ms fuertes que nunca mientras se preparan para dejar Alaska.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E06 - Flood
programme.desc: Cuando se rompe el dique, la cosa se pone fea.... Horas desesperadas repasa algunas de las inundaciones ms devastadoras de la historia, como la de Ro de Janeiro en Brasil, las de Luisiana en Estados Unidos, las de Hamburgo en Alemania, las de Uttarakhand en el norte de la India y el tsunami del Oceano ndico en el sudeste asitico.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E07 - Geological Disasters
programme.desc: A veces, todo lo que se necesita es un movimiento bajo los pies.... Horas desesperadas examina las principales catstrofes geologicas, como las avalanchas de Afganistn, Pakistn, Nepal, Per y Francia. Tambien analiza desprendimientos geologicos en Filipinas, India y Colombia y un enorme socavon que consumio un estanque en Bosnia. Tambien analiza las ventiscas en Estados Unidos, Israel y Reino Unido.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E08 - Nuclear Industrial
programme.desc: Cuando los seres humanos son un grave peligro para s mismos ... Horas desesperadas analiza catstrofes nucleares e industriales como el desastre de la central nuclear de Fukushima en Japon, el de la central nuclear de Chernobil en Ucrania, el vertido de petroleo en aguas profundas del Golfo de Mexico, el del Savar Plaza en Bangladesh y el del gas de Bhopal en la India. Cuando se produce una catstrofe en una central nuclear, el desastre resultante puede ser, literalmente, fuera de escala y durar decadas.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E09 - Disaster at Sea
programme.desc: La navegacion es un negocio peligroso, de hecho...... Las horas desesperadas repasa las principales catstrofes ocurridas en alta mar, como el desastre del transbordador Sewol en Corea del Sur, el Ferry Estonia en el mar Bltico, el hundimiento del Titanic, el Exxon Valdez en Prince William Sound Alaska, el Express Samina en Portes Islets, los ataques piratas al Maersk Alabama y al Seabourn Spirit, y el Costa Concordia en el mar Mediterrneo.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E10 - Disaster in the Air
programme.desc: Where the black box is the only story teller...... Los accidentes aereos son las peores pesadillas de la mayora de la gente. Horas desesperadas repasa las principales catstrofes de la historia de la aviacion, como los vuelos MH17 y MH370 de Malaysia Airlines, el vuelo 447 de Air France, el vuelo 9525 de Germanwings, el desastre del aeropuerto de Tenerife, las catstrofes de los transbordadores espaciales Challenger y Columbia, el accidente del C-130 de la Fuerza Aerea Indonesia en Sumatra en 2015, el accidente del Antonov An-124 de Irkutsk en 1997 y el accidente del vuelo 4590 del Concorde.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E01 - A Family Affair
programme.desc: En los remotos rincones de la sabana de Alaska hay recompensas sin igual. spera, cruda y ahora cocinada, esta es la ltima frontera culinaria donde un chef est redefiniendo lo que significa comer como un salvaje. Los clientes quisquillosos, los cambios climticos bipolares y la escasez de alimentos y suministros a menudo llevan a Bradley al lmite de su cordura, pero este espritu creativo y libre siempre cumple.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E02 - Surfers Delight
programme.desc: En la cocina de pruebas definitiva del Planeta, este episodio sirve una cena especial para un grupo de surfistas, pero se avecina una tormenta. Ser una cena para recordar. En el men, una ensalada verde mixta con vinagreta de frambuesa, gelatina de pescado blanco con pepino y salsa de maz, seguido de fletn a la plancha y polenta.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E03 - Hunters Paradise
programme.desc: Catering fuera de la red no es fcil y la familia Ewing lo sabe. A un grupo de 8 cazadores se les servir una ensalada de remolacha seguida de estofado de venado y de postre tarta de queso con arndanos rojos.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E04 - Celebration
programme.desc: Otra comida de 5 estrellas de la familia Ewing. Esta vez se trata de una cena para algunos nativos locales. Bradley decide ir a la caza de una cabra para el primer plato de rag de cabra estofado a fuego lento, seguido de un risotto de pescado, y para el plato principal - cabra al curry con manzana y chutney de escaramujo y para completar la cena una tarta de lava fundida de chocolate de postre.
